summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1786, for the improvement of each side of 1st Avenue South in the City of Seattle, from the north margin of Holgate Street to the north margin of Atlantic Street, by constructing a sewer therein, of proper dimensions and materials, with all wyes, openings, manholes, catch basins, flush tanks, and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewering and draining of said district, under Ordinance No. 18685 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
